strength.description: Physical power, athletic prowess, melee attacks

conditions.blinded: Can't see, auto-fail sight checks, attacks against you have advantage, your attacks have disadvantage
conditions.charmed: Can't attack charmer, charmer has advantage on social checks
conditions.frightened: Disadvantage on checks and attacks while source of fear is visible, can't willingly move closer
conditions.grappled: Speed becomes 0, ends if grappler is incapacitated
conditions.invisible: Impossible to see without magic, attacks against you have disadvantage, your attacks have advantage
conditions.paralyzed: Incapacitated, can't move or speak, auto-fail STR and DEX saves, attacks against you have advantage, hits within 5ft are critical
conditions.petrified: Transformed to stone, incapacitated, can't move, resistant to all damage
conditions.poisoned: Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks
conditions.prone: Disadvantage on attacks, attacks against you have advantage if within 5ft (disadvantage if farther), costs half movement to stand
conditions.restrained: Speed becomes 0, attacks have disadvantage, attacks against you have advantage, disadvantage on DEX saves
conditions.stunned: Incapacitated, can't move, can speak only falteringly, auto-fail STR and DEX saves, attacks against you have advantage
conditions.unconscious: Incapacitated, can't move or speak, unaware, drops held items, falls prone, auto-fail STR and DEX saves, attacks have advantage, hits within 5ft are critical

combat.critical_damage: Roll all weapon dice twice, then add modifiers

long_rest.duration: At least 8 hours (6 sleeping, 2 light activity)
benefits: Regain half of total Hit Dice

death_saves.rule: When at 0 HP, roll 1d20 each turn (no modifiers)
death_saves.failure: 9 or less is failure, 3 failures = death
death_saves.damage_while_down: Any damage = 1 failure, critical hit = 2 failures

rule_of_cool.description: Reward creative, cinematic actions by reducing DC or granting advantage
guidelines: Must be justified by fiction and character abilities
Can add minor cost or consequence if benefit is large
Hint at it in narration: 'Your creative use makes this easier'
